Name: SerpentVision
Description: SerpentVision is a unique member of the WebtrES club with a fascinating background. Donning a pair of stylish glasses, this soldier-themed box was once part of an elite digital defense force. Known for his snake-like screen, which gives him the uncanny ability to hypnotize his opponents during cyber battles, he swiftly became a legend in the virtual realm. His cat-like arms and legs ensure he always lands on his feet, no matter how tough the terrain gets. SerpentVision's camouflage pattern, reminiscent of a soldier's uniform, is not just for show—it's a tribute to his strategic prowess and commitment to protecting the data streams of the WebtrES world.
